title: Have a Harpy Holiday
description: It's the holiday season and Cadean is feeling neither holly nor jolly. It isn't because she is a harpy and demons don't exactly get into the Holiday Spirit. Nor is it because she has no family, and the only one she has to celebrate with is her friend, Lilith, a borderline psychopath succubus.It's because her latest assignment has been anything but easy.The target isn't what is giving her fits though, it's a rogue angel. A rogue angel that is hell bent on making her even more miserable than she already was b
author: Stephani Hecht
